comment:
* Base for iterators that handle predicates.  Does the basic next 
 * node logic, so all the derived iterator has to do is get the 
 * next node.

methods.name: protected abstract int getNextNode()
methods.comment:
* Get the next node via getNextXXX.  Bottlenecked for derived class override.
   * @return The next node on the axis, or DTM.NULL.

methods.name: public int nextNode()
methods.comment: * Returns the next node in the set and advances the position of the * iterator in the set. After a NodeIterator is created, the first call * to nextNode() returns the first node in the set. * * @return The next Node in the set being iterated over, or * null if there are no more members in that set.

methods.name: public DTMIterator cloneWithReset() throws CloneNotSupportedException
methods.comment:
*  Get a cloned Iterator that is reset to the beginning
   *  of the query.
   * 
   *  @return A cloned NodeIterator set of the start of the query.
   * 
   *  @throws CloneNotSupportedException
